statements: SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id IN (3, 4) ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_activities DESC
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM UserActivity ORDER BY activity_type
SELECT user_id, activity_type, DATE(activity_timestamp) AS date FROM UserActivity WHERE MONTH(activity_timestamp) = 6 AND YEAR(activity_timestamp) = 2021 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, purchase_amount, purchase_timestamp FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100.00;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_amount, purchase_timestamp FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_type) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(activity_type) > 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_timestamp > '2021-01-01' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM purchase_history WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(fraud_score) AS average_fraud_score FROM fraud_detection;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'logout' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(fraud_score) AS total_fraud_score FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_fraud_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM activity_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM activity_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT username, activity_type, timestamp FROM users JOIN activity_logs ON users.user_id = activity_logs.user_id WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, f.detection_type FROM users u JOIN purchases pu ON u.user_id = pu.user_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id JOIN fraud_detection f ON u.user_id = f.user_id;
